summary: A dying Doctor, who plans to check out on his own terms, takes a reluctant detour when he inadvertently winds up on the lam with an 'anything-but-normal' 22-year-old girl.
cast: Tatiana Maslany|Richard Dreyfuss|Jayne Eastwood|Aaron Poole|Eric Peterson|Corinne Conley|Cliff Saunders|Chris Farquhar|Natalie Radford|Misha Rasaiah|Marty Adams|Christopher Cordell|Jessie Gabe|Jee-Yun Lee|Stuart Clow|Michael Cleland|Lewis Hodgson|Brian Nettlefold|Jennifer Matthies|Victoria Bertram|Greg Steven Brown
keywords: character names as title|three word title
title: Cas & Dylan
